author: Kandice Boutte
text:
Hello,
I am conducting a comp analysis on library maintenance costs and I’d like to know the following:
•How much is spent per square foot
•A breakdown of what that includes (for example utilities, repairs, custodial, etc.)
•The number of branch locations/ total square footage
•Annual foot traffic 
Also please let me know if you know of any other resources that might be helpful. 
Thanks for your assistance,
Kandice Boutte
210-207-8019
title: Library Maintenance Costs
